adrFormatAddress: 4 W 58th St, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text:
I had my first saline breast augmentation in 2007 - so 16 years later I started to notice a little rippling and sagging.
I called Ann Arbor Plastic Surgery and went in to see Dr Lapaine for a breast revision consultation.  He was very helpful and informative about my options.  I decided to go with the same size I was already but decided on silicone gel implants this time. Dr Lapaine and  his entire staff were amazing and helped me with everything during the pre op and post op appointments. Recovery was perfect…I just saw him today for my final post op visit. Extremely happy with the results.

originalText.text: I hated the bags under my eyes. I tried everything. I cut down on salt, I used every lotion known to man, slept on my back and went through many cold compresses. Really, no improvement. I interviewed many doctors before I decided to have surgery. Dr. Lapaine fit the bill. He is approachable, professional, and incredibly skilled. My surgery took about an hour; my recovery about two weeks. I no longer look tired. I am refreshed and am so happy with the results. I recommend the surgery, and especially Dr. Lapaine.

originalText.text: I recently have been under the care of the most talented Dr LaPaine and I can not express my gratitude enough towards him and his assistant Jamie and even starting with Mina, the lady that sets up the consult.  You will be respected loved and taken complete care of from the moment you send in to schedule a consultation for eternity it seems.  They have been in my speed dial since I started this journey a couple months ago. I had a tummy tuck with lypo. And I followed the directions perfectly and the outcome is life changing in such a good way!   I am only 3 weeks post op but this is beautiful and it’s suppose to be the bad part. Lol. I’m happy with the bad.  I can not wait to see the final results.  I can’t say enough good things.  Please if you’re considering services. Know you’re in the best hands ever.  He is a true body artist.  And his personality is charming.  You won’t regret your choice. !  Even the surgery center is high class.  It’s a fun time!   Like magical !  ❤️

originalText.text: Dr. Lapaine changed my life. I know it sounds like hyperbole, but it is no exaggeration. I had severe under eye bags, and I went to Dr. Lapaine for a lower blepharoplasty. Dr. Lapaine put my mind at ease right off the bat in my initial consultation by outlining the procedure, and answering all of my questions. I knew exactly what to expect during- and post-surgery, so there were absolutely no surprises. The results blow my mind every time I look in the mirror! My eyes look completely natural, and my bags are 100% gone. Dr. Lapaine is extremely good at what he does. If you are contemplating a blepharoplasty, I am here to tell you not to hesitate. It is worth it, and Dr. Lapaine is the person you should trust to do this for you. I also want to add that Jamie Middlebrook is top notch and will take care of you from start to finish. She was incredibly responsive when I had questions, and was just all around amazing at making me feel comfortable and prepared for the procedure. Thanks to the whole team for everything!!

originalText.text: Dr. Lapaine is an amazing Plastic Surgeon. I couldn't be in better hands than Dr. Lapaine and his wonderful staff. He was professional, friendly, caring and has an expansive knowledge on cosmetic plastic surgery. My eyes look superb, and my surgery was a total success. I feel vibrant, rejuvenated and very, very happy!!!!
